The variables view receives a SUSPEND event and updates the details pane before the popup can be 
displayed. This clears the details pane, but the EvaluateAction still knows what the selection region was 
and the exception happens when the information presenter tries to get the location of the offset that 
doesn't exist in the document anymore.
Fixed in PopupDisplayAction by over riding the getRegion() in EvaluateAction to return the currently 
selected region from the viewer.
